labels.name: Name
labels.activeHintOn: The compo is visible to everyone in the public interface
labels.activeHintOff: The compo is hidden from the public interface
labels.showVotingResultsHintOn: Rankings and scores are publicly visible
labels.showVotingResultsHintOff: Enable after the award ceremony to reveal rankings
labels.isVotableHintOn: Users can vote on entries during the voting period
labels.isVotableHintOff: No voting - use for competitions with external scoring (e.g. Robocode)
labels.hideFromArchiveHintOn: This compo appears in the public archive after the event
labels.hideFromArchiveHintOff: This compo is hidden from the public archive
labels.hideFromFrontpageHintOn: Compo name and description are shown on the event frontpage
labels.hideFromFrontpageHintOff: Compo is hidden from the event frontpage

0.title: No preview
0.description: Don't show any media preview (YouTube or image) on the public entry page

1.title: YouTube, then image
1.description: Show YouTube video if available, otherwise fall back to the uploaded image

2.title: Image only
2.description: Show only the uploaded image preview, ignore any YouTube URL

0.title: Required
0.description: Entrants must upload a separate image file (resized to 160x100 and 640x400 for thumbnails)

1.title: From entry file
1.description: Entry file itself is the image; entry formats must be png/jpg only

2.title: Optional
2.description: Entrants may upload an image file for thumbnails, but it's not required

3.title: Not allowed
3.description: No image file uploads allowed; entries will have no thumbnails
